data.eml:eml: The Triatominae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) of Veracruz, Mexico: geographic distribution, taxonomic redescriptions, and a key

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sandoval-Ruiz, César Antonio, Cervantesperedo, Luis, Mendoza-Palmero, Fredy Severo, Ibáñez-Bernal, Sergio (2012): The Triatominae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) of Veracruz, Mexico: geographic distribution, taxonomic redescriptions, and a key. Zootaxa 3487: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282406
